resources.string: The driver\'s age must be at least 21.
Enter the number of total driving hours that your state requires to take the driver license test:
Enter the number of day driving hours that your state requires: (Enter 0 if there is no requirement.)
Enter the number of night driving hours that your state requires: (Enter 0 if there is no requirement.)
Please add the driver that accompanied you by going to the "Add Driver" menu that can be found in the bottom-right corner of the home page.
Was this driving done at night?
Unable to export using the Maine format: could not save the PDF.
Unable to export log using the Maine format: an app that can handle PDFs is required.
Unable to export log manually: an app that can handle XLS files (i.e. spreadsheets) is required.
Welcome to Permit Log, the app that helps drivers with learner\'s permits record their driving hours!\n\nPlease view this tutorial in portrait mode so that you can read all of the text.
Tap the orange button to add a new supervising driver or to manually enter when you drove.
Once you\'ve added drivers, before you start driving, select the driver that is supervising you here.
Then, tap the "Start Drive" button to start the timer.
When you\'re done driving, tap the "Stop Drive" button to stop the timer and the app will record the drive in the driving log.

Tap the menu button in upper-left corner to see the menu. Edit and export the driving log in the Log page, edit info about the supervising drivers in the Drivers page, and set your goals in the Goals page.

We hope you enjoy using Permit Log!
-Team Redundancy Team
Please connect to the Internet and come back to this app to sign in.
